                    +--net.sourceforge.gjtapi.util.OrderedEventManager
public class OrderedEventManager
extends EventManager

This is an ordered event manager in which one thread serially takes each event off of a queue and asks an EventHandler to process the event. Creation date: (2000-02-25 12:03:34)
